name: MicrosoftFabricPipeline
description: This Test Connection validates the access against the Microsoft Fabric workspace and basic metadata extraction of pipelines.

steps.name: GetPipelines
steps.description: Validate that the API can fetch pipelines from the Microsoft Fabric workspace using the Service Principal credentials.
steps.errorMessage: Failed to fetch pipelines. Please validate the Service Principal credentials (clientId, clientSecret, tenantId) and ensure the workspaceId is correct and the Service Principal has Admin/Contributor role in the workspace.
